opening.title: Digital transformation is not the future it’s the present.
opening.paragraph: Join LR TECH and gain access to tools, knowledge, and technology services that will take your company to the next level.

team.title: What is the team
team.paragraph: Join LR TECH and access tools, knowledge, and technological services that will take your business to the next level.

team-box.title: Diario La República
team-box.paragraph:
Es el primer diario económico del país, especializado en información económica, financiera y empresarial, con información local e internacional.
Este medio agrupa varias unidades de negocio entre estos LR TECH, que ofrecen productos y servicios a empresas.
